name: Hearts of Iron IV Game Save File
summary: Learn about .HOI4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In Windows, HOI4 files are typically saved in the following location:
C:\​Users\​[Username]\​Documents\​Paradox Interactive\​Hearts of Iron IV\​save games

description: An HOI4 file is a game save file created by Hearts of Iron IV, a World War II strategy video game. It contains saved campaign progress, which includes the placement and amount of military resources, battle history, and the time and date.
